```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggcyto)
gs <- load_gs("/fh/fast/gottardo_r/mike_working/HVTN/086/orig/1665-Y-086/")
gs <- gs[1:2]
```

```{r}
p <- ggcyto(gs, aes(x = CD4, y = CD8), subset = "3+") 
# 2d plot
p <- p + geom_hex()
p

# raw scale
p <- p + axis_x_inverse_trans() + axis_y_inverse_trans()
p

#remove outliers by limits
p <- p  + xlim(0,3.5e3) + ylim(-10, 3.5e3) 
p
# add gate
p + geom_gate("4+")

# add two gates
p1 <- p + geom_gate(c("4+","8+")) # short for geom_gate("8+") + geom_gate("4+")
p1

# add stats (for all gate layers by default)
p1 + geom_stats()

# add stats for one specific gate
p1 + geom_stats("4+")

# change type
p1 + geom_stats("4+", type = "count", adjust = 0.2)
```

```{r error=T}
# 'subset' is abstract without specifiying it
p <- ggcyto(gs, aes(x = CD4, y = CD8)) + geom_hex() + axis_x_inverse_trans() + axis_y_inverse_trans() + xlim(0,3.5e3) + ylim(-10, 3.5e3)
p
```

```{r}

# it can be instantiated by gate layer
p + geom_gate(c("4+", "8+"))

# plot all children of the specified parent
p <- ggcyto(gs, aes(x = IFN, y = IL2), subset = "4+") + geom_hex() + axis_x_inverse_trans() + axis_y_inverse_trans()+ xlim(0,3.5e3) + ylim(-10, 3.5e3)
p

p + geom_gate() + geom_stats(fill = "yellow")

# add gates to the arbitary(non-parent) node
p2 <- ggcyto(gs, subset = "3+", aes(x = IFNg, y = IL2)) + geom_hex() + axis_x_inverse_trans() + axis_y_inverse_trans()+ xlim(0,3.5e3) + ylim(-10, 3.5e3)
p2 + geom_gate(c("4+/IFNg+"))

#add filter (consistent with `margin` behavior in flowViz)
# ggcyto(gs, aes(x = CD4, y = CD8), subset = "3+", filter = marginalFilter)  + geom_hex(bins = 32, na.rm = T)

```


```{r}
class(p)
# knowing that for 'ggcyto' is the semi-ggplot object since the data slot is NOT fortified to data.frame
# until it is printed/plotted.
# (other than this it is completely ggplot compatible in terms of adding layers and themes)
class(p$data)

# To return a regular ggplot object
p <- as.ggplot(p)
class(p$data)
```
